itinerary.summary: Arrive in Paris, settle into accommodation, and enjoy a relaxing evening walk along the Seine River with views of the Eiffel Tower.
Explore the Louvre Museum and Notre-Dame Cathedral, followed by a café lunch in the Latin Quarter and a stroll through the Tuileries Garden.
Day trip to the Palace of Versailles to tour the opulent palace and expansive gardens, returning to Paris for dinner.
Travel to Lyon, explore the Old Town, visit the Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourvière, and enjoy Lyonnaise cuisine at a local bistro.
Visit the Musée des Beaux-Arts and Parc de la Tête d'Or, followed by an evening walk along the Rhône River.
Take a train to Avignon, tour the Palais des Papes and Pont Saint-Bénézet, and relax at a café in the historic center.
Explore the local markets and museums, then enjoy a leisurely afternoon in the charming streets and squares of Avignon.
Travel to Nice, stroll along the Promenade des Anglais, visit the Old Town, and enjoy Mediterranean cuisine at a seaside restaurant.
Explore iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum, enjoy a Seine river cruise, and relax in charming cafes soaking in Parisian ambiance.

documents.cover_letter:
The Visa Officer  
[Embassy/Consulate Name]  
[Embassy/Consulate Address]  

Subject: Schengen Visa Application – Rohit Pathak  

Dear Sir/Madam,  

I am writing to apply for a Schengen Short-Stay Visa (Type C) to visit France for tourism from June 10, 2025, to June 18, 2025. I will be traveling with my companion, Anita Pathak.  

The purpose of our trip is purely tourism, and we have made all necessary travel reservations, including flight bookings departing from Bengaluru (BLR) and hotel accommodations in France. I will be personally funding this trip, and I have attached the relevant supporting documents, including travel insurance, hotel and flight reservations, and proof of sufficient funds.  

Please find all required documents enclosed with this application. I respectfully request you to consider my application favorably.  

Thank you for your time and consideration.  

Sincerely,  
Rohit Pathak

documents.checklist:
Core Required Documents:
- [ ] Completed & signed visa application form
- [ ] Passport with required validity and blank pages
- [ ] Recent passport-sized photographs
- [ ] Travel medical insurance (min €30,000 coverage)
- [ ] Round-trip flight reservation
- [ ] Hotel reservation(s) or proof of accommodation
- [ ] Proof of sufficient funds (bank statements, salary slips, etc.)
- [ ] Proof of employment / business / studies
- [ ] Travel itinerary and cover letter explaining trip purpose
